div.p: SAPPERS, are ſoldiers belonging to the royal artillery, whoſe buſineſs it is to work at the ſaps, for which they have an extraordinary pay. A brigade of ſappers generally conſiſts of eight men, divided equally into two parties; and whilſt one of theſe parties is advancing the ſap, the other is furniſhing the gabions, faſcines, and other neceſſary implements. They relieve each other alternately.
